frontmatter.title: Intention to create the first architectural scene in Unreal Engine 5
frontmatter.shortdescription: Perhaps each of us dreams of turning our ideas into reality. And I am no exception. I have a great passion for architecture, and recently I decided to bring my dream to life by creating the first architectural scene in Unreal Engine 5 (UE5).
